synopsis.native: Odette a huit ans, elle aime danser et dessiner. Pourquoi se méfierait-elle d’un ami de ses parents qui lui propose de « jouer aux chatouilles » ? Adulte, Odette danse sa colère, libère sa parole et embrasse la vie...
synopsis.english: Odette is 8 years old, she loves drawing and dancing. Why should she be suspicious of a friend of her parents who offers to "play tickling"? As an adult, Odette dances her anger, embraces life with freedom of speech…
